data.title: AED to USD: Convert United Arab Emirates Dirhams to US Dollars
data.meta_description: Use the AED to USD currency converter at Exchange-Rates.org for accurate and up-to-date exchange rates. Easily convert United Arab Emirates Dirhams to US Dollars with real-time data.
data.text:
Frequently Asked Question about AED to USD

How much is 1 United Arab Emirates Dirham in US Dollars?

1 United Arab Emirates Dirham = 0.2723 US Dollars as of August 19, 2024 12:55 PM UTC. You can get live exchange rates between United Arab Emirates Dirhams and US Dollars using exchange-rates.org, which aggregates real-time forex data from the most authoritative sources.

How much is 100 United Arab Emirates Dirhams in US Dollars?

As of August 19, 2024 12:55 PM UTC, 100 United Arab Emirates Dirhams is equivalent to 27.226 US Dollars. The exchange rate at this time is 0.2723 US Dollars per United Arab Emirates Dirham.

What was the highest AED to USD exchange rate in the last 10 years?

In the last 10 years, the highest rate from United Arab Emirates Dirhams to US Dollars was on March 13, 2016 when each United Arab Emirates Dirham was worth 0.2740 US Dollars.

When is the best time to convert AED to USD?

The AED and USD can be traded 24x5, starting from the time markets open on Monday mornings in Sydney until they close on Fridays at 5 PM in New York. Exchange rates can fluctuate by the minute while markets are open. However, the period between 3-4 PM GMT is often a good time to convert United Arab Emirates Dirhams to US Dollars because currency market liquidity and trading volume tend to be the highest during this time. Additionally, it's advisable to convert United Arab Emirates Dirhams to US Dollars early in the week if you need USD urgently. Executing a trade late in the week might result in a delayed settlement until the following week, as forex markets are closed on weekends.

Which is stronger, the United Arab Emirates Dirham or the US Dollar?

The US Dollar is currently stronger than the United Arab Emirates Dirham, as 1 USD is equal to 3.6730 AED. Conversely, 1 AED is worth 0.2723 USD.

Is the United Arab Emirates Dirham up or down against the US Dollar?

The United Arab Emirates Dirham has decreased -0.004% year-to-date against the US Dollar. Over the past 10 years, the United Arab Emirates Dirham has appreciated +0.11% against the US Dollar. Consequently, the United Arab Emirates Dirham has gained purchasing power compared to the US Dollar over the last decade.

What's the best AED to USD exchange rate today?

As of August 19, 2024 12:55 PM UTC, the best AED to USD exchange rate is 0.2723 USD. This means that for every United Arab Emirates Dirham you exchange, you will receive 0.2723 US Dollars.
